scope.title: Horizon UI - Trendiest Chakra UI Framework

frontMatter.excerpt: Get started and build your dream web app with Horizon UI, the most trendiest &
frontMatter.mdxContent:
--- title: Horizon UI - Trendiest Chakra UI Framework description: Introduction about Horizon UI --- Get started and build your dream web app with Horizon UI, the most trendiest & innovative Open Source Framework for Chakra UI, React and Figma! --- ## Introduction Designed for those who like modern UI elements and beautiful websites. Made of hundred of elements, designed blocks and fully coded pages, Horizon UI is ready to help you create stunning websites and webapps. Save hundreds of hours trying to create and develop a dashboard from scratch. The fastest, most responsive & trendiest Framework for Chakra UI is here. Seriously. With Horizon UI you will find many examples for pages like NFTs Pages, Authentication Pages, Profile and so on. Just choose between a Basic Design or a cover and you are good to go!

 

[ ](https://github.com/horizon-ui/horizon-ui-chakra)

 

## Quick Start Install Horizon UI by running either of the following: - Install NodeJS LTS from [NodeJs Official Page](https://nodejs.org/en/?ref=horizon-documentation) (NOTE: Product only works with LTS version) Clone the repository with the following command: ```bash git clone https://github.com/horizon-ui/horizon-ui-chakra.git ``` Run in terminal this command: ```bash npm install ``` Then run this command to start your local server ```bash npm start ``` ## Upgrade to PRO Version Horizon UI PRO is built with over 400+ frontend individual elements, like buttons, inputs, navbars, nav tabs, cards, or alerts, giving you the freedom of choosing and combining. All components can take variations in color, which you can easily modify using JSS files and classes. Improve your development process with a set of 46+ fully coded pages! Trendy page categories like NFTs pages and many more are available to save your time! You will save a lot of time going from prototyping to full-functional code because all elements are implemented. The PRO Version of Horizon is coming with prebuilt design blocks, so the development process is seamless, switching from our pages to the real website is very easy to be done. [Upgrade to PRO Version](https://horizon-ui.com/pro#pricing?ref=horizon-documentation)

 

[ ](https://horizon-ui.com/pro#pricing?ref=horizon-documentation)
frontMatter.title: Horizon UI - Trendiest Chakra UI Framework
